div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 625 Herastrau, outskirts of Bucharest, Ru- mania, 1938 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (Popescu) Contents: 152 AR. With AR objects Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. incl. imit. Disposition: Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) 59 Moisil, Balcania 1944, pp. 14-5 â€ Popescu, Dacia 1945-7, pp. 35-51, illus.
